ygData.messageBody:
Bards can indeed wear plate. I've been told that you need a minimum
strength of 80 to do so effectively. I don't know if this allows for the
carrying of any loot since the best thing I have so far is snakeskin.

I don't know exactly what the effect dexterity has on hitting notes but it
seems to have a good effect on hitting creatures. I myself dumped all I
could in dexterity.

Songs do not use mana and they will go for as long as you are playing it
for most songs. There are a few songs that will play for a brief time (one
pulse) and then stop. These are usually NPC targeting types of songs like
Lament. Getting stunned, missing a note, or zoning will stop a song.

-----Original Message-----
From: MrWiz@... [mailto:MrWiz@...]
Sent: Saturday, April 24, 1999 6:48 AM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: [eqbards] Stats for a bard


From: MrWiz@...

Hail, fellow bards.

I'm new to the bard class (figure i'll play one monday on the new server),
and had a few questions for you.

First, i noticed that bards can wear plate armor. How much strenghth is
required to wear a full suit of plate armor and still run around and be able
to grab some loot?

I've heard Dexterity has an affect on how well bards play their instruments.
How big of an affect is this? Should i max my dexterity to ensure that i'm
good at playing instruments?

Also, i've heard that since bard spells don't use mana, they can play
indefinately, is this true? How does the whole "song" thing work?

I guess these questions probably get asked a lot... if there's a FAQ or
something i could check our, just point me to it...

thanks all.

-Wiz
